title: Is League blocking my IP? Can't play League on my wifi :(
body: Okay, so I live in the dorms at my college. The University WiFi is what I thought didn't work with League because I could play on my laptop on any other WiFi network EXCEPT the University's WiFi. I've been using my phone's hotspot to play on my laptop, and that works fine, but I prefer to not use my data and hotspot. I talked to the IT people at my university and they said nothing's changed with their WiFi and so they told me to ask League Support if you guys blocked the university's public IP, which is 205.175.97.253

replies.body:
There are a lot of others players on your University's WiFi network that are experiencing this, as I've seen similar posts over the last week or so. 

While they may not be blocking this traffic intentionally, since it's local to that network, your network administrator will need to investigate further. Let me know if you have any questions.
The University you go to could have block the connection to the LOL servers due to the spike on the network if they let people play online games on WiFi
They did not block the LOL servers - even people in the library play League but I'm in my dorm on my laptop and can't play League, using the same WiFi.
